name: Reaching for the Sun
description:
Game description 

Draco the dragon yearns for unlimited power. To gain what he seeks, Draco needs to grow sufficiently large to harness the power of the sun. But can Draco do so before the crocodiles of the land destroy him?

How to play

* Navigate to the linked itch.io page to download the Windows standalone game. 
* Use WASD or arrow keys to move the dragon in the corresponding direction. 
* Move the mouse to position the camera angle.
* Left click down on the mouse to shoot fireballs from the dragon's mouth and defend against enemy attacks. Beware of the crocodiles, who will attack the dragon and drain the dragon's health. 

Team

* Programming - Rafe Bennett
* Music - Kimberly Hou
* Sound - Ekveer Sahoo
* 3D Texture/Shading - Daniel Hudson
* 3D Modeling - Ekveer Sahoo
